SuiteMate - Your Mate for a Better NetSuite Experience

SuiteMate is designed to take your NetSuite experience to the next level. Built to enhance productivity and ease of use, SuiteMate introduces powerful UI improvements and essential features that make navigating NetSuite smoother and more efficient.

With SuiteMate, you can:

	•	Freeze Headers and Columns: Keep important headers and columns visible as you scroll, making data management and analysis easier than ever.
	•	Enhanced Table Sorting: Organize your data effortlessly with advanced sorting options, giving you more control over how you view and interpret information.
	•	Improved Interface: Enjoy a cleaner, more intuitive interface that simplifies tasks and reduces clutter, so you can focus on what matters most.
